Summary: Object captured on live hotel webcam.
divs: sighting detailseveryday i log into the website of: http:\\www.capchoice.com\, to see and compare what is going on in haines ak as this is a future vacation spot for my wife and i. i found this website and approximately 5-6 months ago. the live webcam refreshes every 3 minutes. i've seen all kinds of weather and vehicular, pedestrian traffic in view of the webcam. i've never seen what i've seen this day. once i saw the diamond\cylinder object, i saved the image\browser page as a pdf just in case the object was to be gone next time it refreshed itself. it was gone. i've never seen birds or planes in the view. i've seen rain and snow and ice on the camera. there is like a permanent dirt smear on camera lens right above the object which is always seen\there.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Haines
There were no other sightings in Haines on or around March 20th 2010
